name: Emote Quest
description:
Created for the MoonMoon 2019 Game Jam

Slightly enhanced version of my game from a year ago. Many mistakes are still left in it but it's got a shiny new coat in some areas!

Papaya is a normal highschool girl who finds herself trapped in a weird building filled with even weirder people all
trying to stop her escape...
Can she Get Out of this dreaded place with the help of the friends she's made along the way?

Special thanks to my brother @Megacrustle who made all the artwork in my game!

Controls:

WASD to move

Z to interact

 X to cancel/Open menu 

Shift to run
